author: Benjamin Shingler
title: Under quarantine to help contain COVID-19, migrant farm workers have fears of their own
description: "I know there are citizens here who are worried foreign workers will come here with the virus, but I think the foreign workers are even more worried they will get the virus here," says the owner of a strawberry patch in Île d'Orléans, near Quebec City.
content:
Wearing masks over their worried faces, long-delayed migrant farm workers from Mexico climbed aboard buses waiting for them outside Montreal's Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport on the weekend.
Their hands were sprayed with disinfectant soap and th… [+4157 chars]
